<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Priority Policy Local Prefix (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/prioritypolicylocalprefixes/{priority_policy_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List a specific priority policy local prefix.
